info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 5:31PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN EVANGELINE AND SOUTHEASTERN ALLEN PARISHES THROUGH 630 PM CDT... At 531 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Oberlin. This thunderstorm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vegetation and outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Basile, Oberlin, and Bond. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
